Crimes.Crime_Name: Misrepresentation under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the applicant was inadmissible for misrepresenting Wang Huan Huan as his biological child
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Judicial review of immigration officer's decision
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Application documents, admission of false claim
Crimes.Evaluation_Standard: Potential to induce error in administration of the Act
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Materiality of misrepresentation regarding dependent child status
Crimes.Regulation_Cited: Paragraph 40(1)(a) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Application_Error: Claiming non-biological child as biological without legal adoption
Crimes.Application_Factor: Inclusion of Wang Huan Huan as dependent child
Crimes.Outcome_of_Review: No error found; dismissal of judicial review
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Misrepresentation of relationship with Wang Huan Huan
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Opportunity to respond to visa office request for clarification
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Lack of credibility due to retraction of claim

Crimes.Crime_Name: Failure to disclose material facts under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the applicant was inadmissible for misrepresenting Wang Huan Huan as his biological child
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Judicial review of immigration officer's decision
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Application documents, admission of false claim
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Withholding and misrepresenting true nature of relationship with Wang Huan Huan
Crimes.Evaluation_Standard: Potential to induce error in administration of the Act
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Materiality of failure to disclose true relationship status
Crimes.Regulation_Cited: Paragraph 40(1)(a) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Application_Error: Failing to disclose that Wang Huan Huan was not legally adopted or biologically related
Crimes.Application_Factor: Inclusion of Wang Huan Huan as dependent child based on false premise
Crimes.Outcome_of_Review: No error found; dismissal of judicial review
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Failure to disclose material fact about Wang Huan Huan's legal status and relationship
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Opportunity to respond to visa office request for clarification
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Lack of credibility due to retraction of claim
Crimes.Omission_Type: Withholding material fact about adoption and biological relationship
